text: I Made Andhika Pradana Wijaya (born 12 July 1996) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a right back for Liga 1 club Bali United. ==Career== ===Bali United=== He made his debut in Liga 1 on 16 April 2017 against Madura United. == Honours == ===Club=== ;Bali United * Liga 1: 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Andhika Wijaya at Liga Indonesia official website * Andhika Wijaya at Bali United Official Website * Andhika Wijaya at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Balinese people Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Bali United F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Jakarta
title: I Made Andhika Wijaya
